ShowSelector.Name: Show Chat Selector
ShowSelector.Hint: Displays a selector that allows chatting as a character without selecting a token.

SpeakAsToken.Name: Speak As Token Mode
SpeakAsToken.Hint: When enabled, it will behave as if you were speaking with the selected character's token, even if the token is not in the scene.

ShowPortrait.Name: Show Chat Portrait
ShowPortrait.Hint: Displays the speaker's portrait in chat messages.

PortraitSize.Name: Portrait Size
PortraitSize.Hint: Sets the size of the chat portrait in pixels.

UseUserColor.Name: Use User Color for Portrait Border
UseUserColor.Hint: Uses the user's color as the border color.

UseUserBorder.Name: Use User Color for Chat Border
UseUserBorder.Hint: Uses the user's color as the border color of chat messages.(v12)

UseSecondaryColor.Name: Use Secondary Color
UseSecondaryColor.Hint: Use secondary color for gradients and double borders

SecondaryColor.Name: Secondary Color
SecondaryColor.Hint: Color used for gradients and double borders

UseGlowEffect.Name: Use Glow Effect
UseGlowEffect.Hint: Apply a glowing effect to borders

GlowColor.Name: Glow Effect Color
GlowColor.Hint: Color used for the glowing effect

UseHpTint.Name: Show HP Status
UseHpTint.Hint: Portrait becomes redder as HP decreases

HpTintIntensity.Name: HP Status Intensity
HpTintIntensity.Hint: Sets the intensity of the red tint for HP status

HpCurrentPath.Name: Current HP Path
HpCurrentPath.Hint: Enter the actor data path where current HP is stored

HpMaxPath.Name: Maximum HP Path
HpMaxPath.Hint: Enter the actor data path where maximum HP is stored

HidePortrait.Name: Hide D&D5e Portrait
HidePortrait.Hint: Hides the default D&D5e chat portrait when enabled. This helps avoid duplicate portraits when using the Chat Selector module.

AllowedModuleFlags.Name: Allowed Module Flags
AllowedModuleFlags.Hint: Enter module flag IDs separated by commas to allow portrait display for their messages (e.g., foundryvtt-simple-calendar, module-id-2)

DropdownBackground.Name: Dropdown Background Color
DropdownBackground.Hint: Set the background color of the dropdown menu

DropdownTextColor.Name: Dropdown Text Color
DropdownTextColor.Hint: Set the text color of the dropdown menu

DropdownBorderColor.Name: Dropdown Border Color
DropdownBorderColor.Hint: Set the border color of the dropdown menu

DropdownHoverColor.Name: Dropdown Hover Color
DropdownHoverColor.Hint: Set the background color when hovering over dropdown items

EnableThumbnailPreview.Name: Enable Thumbnail Preview
EnableThumbnailPreview.Hint: Show large preview when hovering over character thumbnails

EnableHotkeys.Name: Enable Actor Switch Hotkeys
EnableHotkeys.Hint: You can quickly switch actors using Ctrl + number/letter keys.

HotkeyModifier.Name: Hotkey Modifier Key
HotkeyModifier.Hint: Select a modifier key to use with the hotkey. Be careful to avoid conflicts with other Foundry hotkeys.

HotkeyConfig.Instructions: Click each actor's input field and press the desired key to set a hotkey (number or letter).
HotkeyConfig.ModifierNote: The assigned hotkey will be used with {modifier} (e.g., {modifier} + 1).

EnableRuby.Name: Enable Ruby Text
EnableRuby.Hint: Enable ruby text support in chat

RubySize.Name: Ruby Text Size
RubySize.Hint: Set the size of ruby text relative to the base text

RubyColor.Name: Ruby Text Color
RubyColor.Hint: Set the color of ruby text

Settings.ReloadRequired: Please refresh your browser for the changes to take effect.

HotkeyConfig.Title: Actor Switch Hotkey Configuration
HotkeyConfig.Instructions: Click each actor's input field and press the desired key to set a hotkey.
HotkeyConfig.ModifierNote: The assigned hotkey will be used with the {modifier} key.
